mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM seat WHERE tid = #{tid}
SELECT count(*) FROM seat WHERE tid = #{tid} AND reserved = 'n'
SELECT * FROM seat WHERE tid = #{tid} ORDER BY id
SELECT price FROM pay WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT mt.id AS tid , b.location , b.name AS bname , t.name AS tname FROM movie_theater mt JOIN theater t ON mt.tid = t.id JOIN branch b ON t.bid = b.id WHERE mt.id = #{tid}
SELECT * FROM branch WHERE location = #{location} ORDER BY name

SELECT DISTINCT a.mid, b.id, b.rating, b.title, c.bid, d.location, d.name FROM movie_theater a JOIN movie b ON a.mid = b.id JOIN theater c ON a.tid = c.id JOIN branch d ON c.bid = d.id WHERE d.location = #{location} AND d.name = #{name}

SELECT m.id, m.playdate, th.bid, th.name, mt.mid, mt.tid, mt.enddate, t.starttime, t.endtime, (SELECT count(*) FROM seat s WHERE s.tid = th.id) as seat_count, (SELECT count(*) FROM seat s WHERE s.reserved = 'y') as seat_reserved FROM time t JOIN movie_theater mt ON t.mtid = mt.id JOIN movie m ON mt.mid = m.id JOIN theater th ON mt.tid = th.id JOIN branch b ON th.bid = b.id WHERE b.location = #{location} AND b.name = #{name} AND m.rating = #{rating} AND m.title = #{title} AND TO_CHAR(t.moviedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{moviedate}
SELECT starttime FROM time WHERE mtid = #{mtid} AND moviedate = #{moviedate}
SELECT endtime FROM time WHERE mtid = #{mtid} AND moviedate = #{moviedate}
